title: My card got charged but didnt recieve RP
body:
Hello guys, i'd appreciate some help with this, i have sent a ticket to riot regarding the problem, but i dont know what will happen.

>So i paid for the 35€ RP package with money on my card (that i am 100% sure of)
>But now my card got charged after the purchase said "Your card has been declined by your provider"
>And i didnt recieve any RP.
I dont know what to do, i called my bank and they said to inform riot about what happened, and that they should tell my bank to cancel the order so i can get my money back, or through the order so the RP will be added to my account.


Have anyone else tried this who can tell me what happened?
{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}

replies.body: There's a good chance that it might be a pending charge that you're seeing, but our billing agents will be able to tell for sure what happened in our payment systems! Be sure to check back up on your ticket for their responses.

I’d recommend submitting a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com) where a dedicated Billing agent will be able to verify your account and reverse charges if they confirm you were charged incorrectly.
